import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Separate features and target
X_train = train_df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Survived'], axis=1)
y_train = train_df['Survived']

# Handle missing values
X_train['Age'].fillna(X_train['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Fare'].fillna(X_train['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_train['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
X_train['Embarked'].fillna(X_train['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

# Encode categorical variables
le_sex = LabelEncoder()
le_embarked = LabelEncoder()

X_train['Sex'] = le_sex.fit_transform(X_train['Sex'])
X_train['Embarked'] = le_embarked.fit_transform(X_train['Embarked'])

# One-hot encode cabin (grouped by first letter)
X_train['Cabin'] = X_train['Cabin'].str[0].fillna('Unknown')
X_train = pd.get_dummies(X_train, columns=['Cabin'], prefix='Cabin')

# Drop unused columns
X_train = X_train.drop(['Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1)

# Prepare test data
X_test = test_df.drop(['PassengerId'], axis=1)
X_test['Age'].fillna(X_test['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Fare'].fillna(X_test['Fare'].median(), inplace=True)
X_test['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
X_test['Embarked'].fillna(X_test['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)

X_test['Sex'] = le_sex.transform(X_test['Sex'])
X_test['Embarked'] = le_embarked.transform(X_test['Embarked'])
X_test['Cabin'] = X_test['Cabin'].str[0].fillna('Unknown')
X_test = pd.get_dummies(X_test, columns=['Cabin'], prefix='Cabin')

# Drop unused columns
X_test = X_test.drop(['Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1)

# Ensure all columns in test match training
train_cols = X_train.columns
X_test = X_test.reindex(columns=train_cols, fill_value=0)
